# Summary

This script creates the social pressure mangement layer. This layer is just the inverse of the management resilience layer. 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
```

# Methods

```{r}
#read in res_mgmt layer

prs_mgmt <- read_csv(file.path(dir_github, "/prep/resilience/social/management/res_mgmt.csv")) %>% 
  mutate(
    pressure_score = 1 - res_score
  ) %>%
  dplyr::select(region_id, year, pressure_score)

#write to Toolbox

write_csv(prs_mgmt, file.path(dir_scores, "/region/layers/prs_mgmt.csv"))


```
